I read a bit on ulcers summer 2005 and stopped when it got complicated
with=
 genetics, brain chemistry and the new nobel prize winning discovery 
which=
 points to ulcers as being an infectious disease caused by a
bacteria of so=
me sort (link which explains this discovery is in the
document below)

http=
://1happyturtle.com/makoto/SaitouUlcers.htm

I decided to spend a couple of=
 hours typing this because one of my
older much loved, albeit annoying co-w=
orkers is an ulcer patient.  He
DOES FIT these personality traits...and to =
top it off he is the "rare"
kind of ulcer patient.  The juvenile ulcer pati=
ent...and to make it
more interesting...he's a leftie. After grilling him w=
ith questions I
formed from my superficial study I knew that there is "some=
thing to"
these kinds of people--after all ulcers have mental causes.

ok m=
y mini fangirl essay will not and cannot prove that Fujita Goro was
1) a ju=
venile ulcer patient
however I think that there are some things in the essa=
y which will be
of interest to some people

I can't upload it to http://www=
.shinsengumihq.com because unlike the 
Okita + TB essay
http://www.shinseng=
umihq.com/TBandOkita.htm

ut page numbers,

ll use the good old MLA citation system in

cks page numbers wwhich would

uestions you can aim me at "badgerturtle" or see me in
